sentences.en: a knife with a serrated edge
Bread knives should have a serrated edge.
sentences.cn: 面包刀的刀刃应该有波浪齿。

sentences.en: Dark green, pointed, thick, serrated. Single crown, may sucker. Small standard.
sentences.cn: 深绿色尖型厚叶子, 锯齿叶缘.通常单个顶芽, 有时候会有侧芽. 小的标准型.

sentences.en: Double medium blue frilled star. Medium - dark green, pointed, serrated. Large.
sentences.cn: 重瓣中蓝色波折星型花. 中到深绿色尖型叶, 锯齿叶缘.大型.

sentences.en: Double yellow and white pansy. Medium green, plain, heart - shaped, pointed, serrated. Semiminiature.
sentences.cn: 重瓣黄色和白色的菫型花. 中绿色平坦的心型尖 状 叶, 锯齿叶缘.半迷你型.

sentences.en: Mr. Ma used a serrated knife he kept in his jeans.
sentences.cn: 马先生拿出放在牛仔裤中的一把锯齿刀,只用三刀就切断了女孩的胫骨.

sentences.en: Single medium blue. Medium green, pointed, hairy, serrated. Standard.
sentences.cn: 单瓣中蓝色花. 中绿色尖型叶, 叶面多毛, 锯齿叶缘.标准型.

sentences.en: Slash the tops of the loaves with a sharp serrated knife in a criss-cross pattern.
sentences.cn: 把烤面包顶部用锋利的锯齿刀交错切开。

sentences.en: The cells have an irregular shape with a slightly serrated border.
sentences.cn: 细胞的形状不规则,边缘呈锯齿状.

sentences.en: The plant has serrated and hairy leaves.
sentences.cn: 这棵植物长着锯齿状的毛茸茸的叶子。

sentences.en: The small serrated edge tracing wheel is used for most fabrics.
sentences.cn: 大多数面料可用小的、锯齿边的擂盘.

sentences.en: TL variegated medium green and white, heart - shaped, serrated, girl foliage. Semiminiature.
sentences.cn: 中绿色和白色组合成的TL型 斑叶, 心型白脉叶, 锯齿叶缘. 半迷你型.

sentences.en: To shape or enlarge ( a hole ) with a tapered, serrated tool.
sentences.cn: 凿孔扩大用带齿的尖的工具钻或扩大 ( 孔 )

sentences.en: Two - part serrated nozzle for easy removal without detaching hoses.
sentences.cn: 不用与内部管路分开,就可以轻易拆开、装管口喷嘴.

sentences.en: Use a knife with a serrated edge .
Variegated medium green and cream, plain, pointed, serrated. Large.
sentences.cn: 中绿色和奶油色组合成的平坦尖型斑叶, 锯齿叶缘.大型.

words.tran_cn: 有细锯齿的；细锯齿状的，细锯齿边的
（行扫描起点不一致引起屏幕上的）锯齿状；锯齿状突起（等于serrature）

trans.tran_cn: 边缘呈锯齿状的，有锯齿形边缘的
trans.tran_en: having a sharp edge made of a row of connected points like teeth
